name: Anandra George
offering: Coach Certification, Communication Training, Life Coaching Certification, Public Speaking, Speaker Training, Spiritual Coaching
what_you_do: Anandra George created the world's first and only 200-300-500 hour teacher training focused ENTIRELY on the transformative power of sound.
who_you_serve: Therapists, wellness practitioners, yoga teachers, life coaches, counselors, business executives, musicians, sound healers, music therapists, and educators of all kinds from over 55 countries.
social_proof: Tens of thousands of students from 65+ countries have benefited from her fresh, reverent, dynamic invitation into the heart of sound.
signature_programs: 200/300/500HR teacher training courses in nada yoga, Sanskrit mantra, sound healing, vocal empowerment, harmonium, and more.
business_focus: Offering transformative sound-based yoga therapy practices and teacher training programs.
service_provided: Sound healing, mantra meditation, nada yoga, yoga teacher training
